hero.core_tension: Choose between broad discounting that drives footfall but erodes margin and a local creator residency that trades reach for higher-value buyers in a narrow window.
hero.setting: Flagship storefront edge: polished concrete floor, reserved display pegs, visible back-room inventory shelf, sidewalk visible through glass.
hero.action: Selecting a creator roster and tagging reserved inventory for a 4-6 week in-store residency pilot.
hero.urgency_symbol: Converging light bands narrowing toward a focused highlight to imply a closing testing window.
props: shelf tags marked 'creator drop — unique QR',
small stack of returnable drop boxes (no logos)
hero.lighting: Polished editorial, confident highlights on the operator and reserved inventory, soft fill to keep negative space clean.
hero.alt: Head of Retail assigning creator residencies and unique QR tests for a 4–6 week flagship pilot

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings and radial arcs: outer ring for general holiday traffic, inner arcs for early-window purchasers, linked nodes for creator activations.
elements: node tokens for micro-creators (size = local follower overlap),
QR nodes anchored to store entry points
signal_map.motion: Directional flows from sidewalks into store and then into early-window purchase arcs; pulses indicate measurement touchpoints.
signal_map.palette: Matte concrete textures with neon accent lines to show signal strength and warm metallic tokens for creators.
signal_map.alt: Head of Partnerships viewing a rings map encoding footfall uplift and early-window share for creator-led drops

case_studies.scene: In-store residency day: a micro-creator filming short-form content at a reserved shelf while staff manage a shoppable QR station nearby.
case_studies.moment: Operator and creator align a shoppable CTA and scan flow right after a limited drop to capture same-day conversions.
props: QR redemption pad with unique creator code,
small sign noting 'same-day POS trace code'
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial; highlight on QR pad and creator face; clean negative space around inventory.
case_studies.alt: Head of Partnerships running a creator residency test with unique QR to trace same-day purchases

case_studies.scene: Side-by-side comparison: a collab-led pop-up with limited-edition stock vs. a discount corner; manager annotates margin and buyer value on a tablet.
case_studies.moment: Decision point measuring buyer share and margin impact after a weekend event vs sitewide holiday discount.
props: two product islands labeled 'collab drop' and 'discount stack',
tablet showing event CPA and conversion_rate overlays
case_studies.lighting: Confident highlights on product islands; high-contrast to separate the two mechanisms.
case_studies.alt: CFO comparing collab pop-up buyer share and event CPA versus blanket discounts

case_studies.scene: Resolved storefront: operators review a slim dashboard printout pinned to the wall showing measured lifts and QR traces after the pilot.
case_studies.moment: Post-pilot alignment where creator residencies met target early-window share and footfall goals, inventory reserved and traced.
props: empty reserved-boxes staged to suggest turnover rate
case_studies.lighting: Warm editorial highlight on the metric printouts; clean shadow on surrounding space to show focus.
case_studies.alt: Head of Retail reviewing post-pilot metrics showing footfall lift and early-window share targets hit
